Already have, and already am. Within limitations, what has been 
addressed =
is an attempt to benefit the community and give something 
back for the ben=
efits received. What you have initially done with 
NEAT has much more poten=
tial in multiple dimensions than publically

ed a breadcrumb trail was better than 
nothing. If they are ignored, it doe=
s not negate their value, or the 
intentions with which they were offered. =
Let those who have ears to 
hear, hear.
